awards.text: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 6 wins & 10 nominations.

fullplot: William Shakespeare's classic play is brought into the present with the setting as Great Britian in the 1930s. Civil war has erupted with the House of Lancaster on one side, claiming the right to the British throne and hoping to bring freedom to the country. Opposing is the House of York, commanded by the infamous Richard who rules over a fascist government and hopes to install himself as a dictator monarch.
plot: The classic Shakespearean play about a murderously scheming king staged in an alternative fascist England setting.
title: Richard III

tomatoes.consensus: This re-imagining of Shakespeare's Crookback King relocates the story in 1930 and features an indelible star turn for Ian McKellen as the monstrous and magnetic King Richard.
